attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the European Constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The arrogance of the government to think that just because they call it a "treaty" they don't have to hold a referendum is mind blowing. IT IS A CONSTITUTION, there are even ministers from E.U member countries who think that it is a constitution. The government needs to stay faithful to the election manifesto and hold a referendum and thats what we demand.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/LTPD07/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
